brand.title: ØKP4 Faucet
brand.description: Hello fellow data space invader! Use this faucet to get tokens for the latest ØKP4 testnet. Please don't abuse this service—the number of available tokens is limited.

info.limitation: You'll receive 1 KNOW per request, with a maximum of 1 request each 5 seconds.
info.description: Don't have a testnet address? To get one, the easiest way is to use Keplr, the crypto wallet for OKP4. Connect Keplr to the testnet-okp4-1 to see your address.
